code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import recipes from'./Recipe';import Header from'./Header';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Home=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const goToRecipePage=index=>{navigate("/recipe/".concat(index));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{title:"McDonald's Menu"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"recipe-grid",children:recipes.map(recipe=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"recipe-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:recipe.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:recipe.image,alt:"Picture of ".concat(recipe.title)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"description",children:recipe.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"view-details-btn",onClick:()=>goToRecipePage(recipe.index),children:"View Details"})]}))})})]});};
